title: 440. Does Advertising Actually Work? (Part 1: TV)
description: Companies around the world spend more than half-a-trillion dollars each year on ads. The ad industry swears by its efficacy — but a massive new study tells a different story.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
